name: NinjaCube
description:
NinjaCube is a very hard endless runner game. Try it now! Also, try not to rage quit.

Challenge: Can you finish the game under 10 minutes?

HOW TO DOWNLOAD: Click on the download button, and then right click the file in file explorer and click the "Extract Here" option, or "Extract All". After that, search for "Ninja Cube" in file explorer and double click on that, and enjoy.

TO EXIT the game you need to press "Alt+Tab" and then close the window.

(The game is only for PC)

The winners of the game:

1. Yiftach Rak

2. Tomer Shifferman
